summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a business checking account at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period from February 1, 2015, to February 28, 2015. It outlines the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and overdraft fees associated with the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $139,471.98 as of February 1, 2015.
The account experienced service charges and fees totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
The ending balance of the account as of February 28, 2015, remained $139,471.98.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
There are provisions for provisional credit in case of reported errors during the investigation period.
